text: Penguin Bloom is a 2020 drama film directed by Glendyn Ivin, based on the book of the same name by Bradley Trevor Greive. ==Premise== A photographer and his family find hope and solace in an injured Magpie chick while struggling to adjust to the photographer's wife's paralysis following a balcony collapsing whilst on an overseas holiday with her family. ==Cast== *Naomi Watts as Sam Bloom *Andrew Lincoln as Cameron Bloom *Jacki Weaver as Jan *Rachel House as Gaye *Leeanna Walsman as Kylie *Lisa Hensley as Bron *Griffin Murray-Johnston as Noah Bloom *Felix Cameron as Rueben Bloom *Abe Clifford-Barr as Oli Bloom ==Production== The rights to the book were acquired in December 2016. Naomi Watts was set to star, and will produce alongside Bruna Papandrea and Emma Cooper.‘Penguin Bloom’ Binds Naomi Watts, Reese Witherspoon & Bruna Papandrea In June 2017, Shaun Grant was hired to write the screenplay.Shaun Grant To Adapt ‘Penguin Bloom’; Naomi Watts To Star By February 2019, Glendyn Ivin was set to direct, and in July Andrew Lincoln, Jacki Weaver and Rachel House were added to the cast.‘Penguin Bloom’ adaptation receives Screen Australia funding‘Walking Dead’s Andrew Lincoln Joins Naomi Watts In ‘Penguin Bloom’Jacki Weaver Joins Cast Of ‘Penguin Bloom’ Movie Filming began in Australia in early August 2019.Screen Aust spending $4m on new film, TV series & online projectsAndrew Lincoln Joins Naomi Watts in 'Penguin Bloom'Naomi Watts on Instagram: Day #1 of the long awaited #PenguinBloom movie.
